listMenuItem.name: Shrimp Fried Rice
listMenuItem.consist: fresh steamed white rice stir-fried with shrimp, egg, white onion, carrots, sweet peas and scallions

listMenuItem.name: Spring Roll
listMenuItem.consist: fried rolls stuffed with vegetables served with sweet and sour sauce

listMenuItem.name: Age Tofu
listMenuItem.consist: deep fried tofu with ginger sauce

listMenuItem.name: Asian Fusion Fried Rice
listMenuItem.consist: fried rice with chicken, pork and beef and vegetables

listMenuItem.name: Wonton Soup
listMenuItem.consist: pork wonton soup wtih mixed vegetables

listMenuItem.name: Japanese Salad
listMenuItem.consist: large green salad with shrimp and krab stick

listMenuItem.name: Salmon
listMenuItem.consist: fresh salmon, cooked with choice of garlic, basil or ginger sauce

listMenuItem.name: Honey Chicken
listMenuItem.consist: tempura battered deep fried boneless chicken with honey sauce
